name: Ancient Aboleth
description: The Ancient Aboleth is a massive aberration with a slippery, translucent body, equipped with numerous long, sinuous tentacles. It can manipulate its surroundings with psychic abilities, and its skin glistens with an inky sheen.
memorable: Its ability to inflict diseases and manipulate minds creates a unique psychological threat in addition to its physical prowess.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate weaker minds and expand its influence over aquatic territories.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other aberrations or aquatic creatures, often acting as a master to lesser beings.
environment: Thrives in watery environments but can also operate in air, making it versatile in various terrains.
strengths: Possesses formidable psychic abilities, significant hit points, and the capacity to inflict debilitating diseases.
weaknesses: Relatively average in physical dexterity compared to its impressive mental capabilities.
attacks: Attacks with its tentacles, inflicting bludgeoning damage, or can choose to infect targets with the Sea Change disease.
most_powerful_ability: Slimy Cloud, which releases a damaging and obscuring cloud of slime, heavily impairing those caught within it.
senses: The creature has blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to detect creatures even in darkness or obscured conditions.
skills: Skilled in deception and history, it can manipulate foes effectively and outsmart opponents through its intelligence.
additional_information: Can innately cast spells, such as Detect Thoughts and Phantasmal Force.
Highly intelligent with an IQ on par with the greatest minds.
Legendary actions enhance its combat capabilities.
Can communicate telepathically, sharing thoughts with creatures.
Its Sea Change disease significantly alters the affected creature's abilities and playstyle.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability allows it to cast spells without components, focusing on mind-affecting spells.
